name: Split Pad Pro
description:
Vectronics I.O. is proud to bring you SPLIT PAD PRO! Explore the cutting edge in graphics technology and challenge your mind as we move the arcade experience into your home!

This game is best played with a Vectronics I.O. brand gamepad, but we have graciously included support for any standard gamepad. If you don't have a gamepad, the keyboard will work in a pinch! Simply press R instead of select to reset the levels!

Our forward thinking engineers are proud to say that a manual is not required! Our top of the line thinkers use the Vectronics I.O. Brand Thinking Modality to convey the instructions right to your brain!

We at Vectronics I.O. sincerely hope you enjoy our products! Play well, and don't disappoint the robot overlords!
